Description: On VA-20 in the County of Albemarle, in the vicinity of Marshall Ct; Rt. 1800E/W (Albemarle County), motorists can expect delays due to other security/police activity. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Security/Police Activity - Other Security/Police Activity

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 64 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
